coreAttributes.name: Cleaver-Sword
coreAttributes.description: A flat one edged blade that looks like it was made by barbarians. It's been quickly and crudely sharpened and has multiple dents in the sword. Dirty bandages cover the handle. A gem sits lodged in the handle and gives the blade arcane ability.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Bellowing out a war-cry, [npc.name] [npc.verb(charge)] at [npc2.name], swingling wildly.
[Npc.name] [npc.verb(throws)] their cleaver sword at [npc2.name], getting it lodged in their shoulder!!
[Npc.name] [npc.verb(throws)] their cleaver sword at [npc2.name], getting it lodged in their chest!!
[Npc.name] [npc.verb(throws)] their cleaver sword at [npc2.name], getting it lodged in their stomach!!
[Npc.name] [npc.verb(charges)] [npc2.name], should-checking them off-balance. [Npc.name] proceeds to chop the blade into the chest of [npc2.name], zapping their energy.

missDescriptions.missText: [Npc.name] tries to bellow out, but does it too hard and starts coughing, interrupting [npc.her] plans.
[Npc.name] attempts to throw their blade, but it ends up slipping, the dull part landing on their foot.
